text: He merges the night into the day (i.e., the decrease in the hours of the night gets added to the hours of the day), and He merges the day into the night. And He has controlled and regulated the sun and the moon, all (of these heavenly bodies) swiftly move for a term appointed. Such, to you, is Allah, your Nourisher-Sustainer; His is the Dominion . And those whom you invoke (or call upon) besides Him â€” they do not own even a Qitmir
